error.submitError: Ako se pogreška nastavi pojavljivati, navratite na our forum i javite nam ili dostavite problem na GitHub. Hvala!

index.metaDescription: Izgradite svoj uradi sam senzor i postanite dio svjetske mreže građanske znanosti, otvorenih podataka i građanske tehnologije. Podržano od strane mnogih suradnika 💕
index.metaTitle: Sensor.Community 🌐 Izgradite vlastiti senzor i pridružite se svjetskoj mreži građanskih tehnologija
index.message-description: Sensor.Community je globalna senzorska mreža vodjena suradnicima koja stvara otvorene podatke o okolišu.
index.message-mission: Naša misija je nadahnuti i obogatiti živote ljudi nudeći platformu za kolektivnu znatiželju koja je u prirodi istinska, radosna i pozitivna.
index.message-hubs: Sensor.Community ima globalna središta u Stuttgartu, Sofiji i Varšavi.

sensor.metaTitle: Pronađite svoj senzor i upute za izradu svog uradi-sam senzora fine prašine
sensor.subtitle: Odaberi uputstvo i sagradi svoj senzor.

dnms.metaTitle: Izgradite vlastiti senzor za mjerenje buke.

donate.metaDescription: We are non-profit, non-corporate and non-compromised. People like you help us. We rely on donations to carry out our mission.
donate.metaTitle: Donirajte - pomozite nam pokazujući svoju ljubav
donate.description: Mi smo neprofitni, nekompromitirani i nekorporativni. Ljudi poput vas nam pomažu. Oslanjamo se na donacije u izvršavanju naše misije.
donate.donationDescription: Änderwerk gemeinnützige GmbH priznata je kao neprofitna organizacija.

blog.description: Pronađi novosti ili druge zanimljive informacije

contributors.description: Upoznajte tim koji radi iza kulisa kako bi ojačali Sensor.Community.
contributors.contactBottom: 📮Koristite opcije za kontakt na dnu stranice.

projects.description: Find mobile apps, websites,... from our lovely community 💖️
projects.submitIdea: Have a great project? Share it with the community!

footer.mission: Making the world a better place through community driven, open environmental data.

imprint.privacyPolicyDesc: With this privacy policy we would like to inform you about the type, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data on our website. Personal data are all data that have a personal reference to you, e.g. name, address, e-mail address or user behaviour. With regard to the terms used, such as "processing" or "responsible person", we refer to the definitions in Art. 4 of the Basic Data Protection Regulation (DSGVO)
imprint.privacyPolicyContactTitle: Contact via e-mail, social media or telephone
imprint.privacyPolicyContactDescription: As far as you address the e-mail, telephone or social media offered on our website and provide us with personal data, these data will be automatically stored and processed by our team to process your inquiry. These data are only processed for correspondence with you. We need your e-mail address to be able to answer your inquiry. We need your telephone number in order to be able to answer your callback request. Legal basis: The legal basis for the use of your data as described above is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a DSGVO. Deletion: The personal data collected by us will be deleted if they are no longer required. We check the necessity every 2 years. You can also revoke the data processing at any time.
